comment._content: "Helen Miller Gould Shepard (June 20, 1868 – December 21, 1938) was an American philanthropist born in Manhattan in New York City.[1]" Daughter of railroad magnate Jay Gould. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Miller_Shepard

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for Shepherd's full name here.  We'll include it next time we update the description.
